Elle ne mesure que 6‚Äô54‚Äô‚Äô d‚Äôarc d‚Äôo√π le challenge pour la shooter car il n‚Äôy a que tr√®s peu de r√©f√©rence photographique. (√Ä part hubble et Adam Block...)

Cam√©ra imagerie: Zwo asi 1600mmpro
Monture: ioptron CEM60-EC
Lunette guide TSoptic 329mm

Version L-RHaVB

Concernant la prise de vue, rien ne vous choque? 
Normalement tout! Car ce fut sportif. 
Je suis compl√®tement sur-√©chantillonn√© avec cette configuration et ma lunette guide n‚Äôest pas adapt√©e avec cette focale ramen√©e √† 1645mm. 
Je voulais essayer avec un OAG pr√©vu pour les shoots √† cette focale mais je n‚Äôai pas r√©ussi √† avoir la map entre ma cam√©ra principale et secondaire. (En attendant la zwo asi mini du coupüòâ). 
J‚Äôai √©t√© hyper s√©lectif concernant ma couche Luminance. Je l‚Äôai mix√©e (avec un masque) avec le Ha pour avoir les petites zones color√©es magenta qui sont de v√©ritables pouponni√®res d‚Äô√©toiles.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Ngc3344, nicknamed the galaxy of the cut onion.

It is located in the constellation of the little lion at 20 million light years away. Thanks to the images of hubble, we know that this spiral galaxy (weakly barred) is 2X smaller than the Milky Way.
It measures only 6‚Äô54 ‚Äô‚Äô of arc from where the challenge to shoot it because there is very little photographic reference.(Except hubble and Adam Block ...)

Regarding the shooting, nothing shocks you?
Normally everything! Because it was complicated.
I am completely oversampled with this configuration and my guide scope is not suitable with this focal length reduced to 1645mm.
I wanted to try with an OAG planned for shoots at this focal length but I couldn't manage to have the map between my main and secondary camera. (While waiting for the zwo asi miniüòâ).
I was very selective about my Luminance layer. I mixed it (with a mask) with the Ha to have the small magenta colored areas which are real nurseries of stars.
The RGB assembly was fairly classic even if there was little reference. So I used photometriccolorcalibration on Pix.
It took 2 days of pretreatment and treatment for this result which I like, hoping not to have distorted it.
